ans1: I do not feel sad.
ans2: I feel sad.
ans3: I am sad all the time and I can't snap out of it.
ans4: I am so sad and unhappy that I can't stand it.

ans1: I am not particularly discouraged about the future.
ans2: I feel discouraged about the future.
ans3: I feel I have nothing to look forward to.
ans4: I feel the future is hopeless and that things cannot improve.

ans1: I do not feel like a failure.
ans2: I feel I have failed more than the average person.
ans3: As I look back on my life, all I can see is a lot of failures.
ans4: I feel I am a complete failure as a person.

ans1: I get as much satisfaction out of things as I used to.
ans2: I don't enjoy things the way I used to.
ans3: I don't get real satisfaction out of anything anymore.
ans4: I am dissatisfied or bored with everything.

ans1: I don't feel particularly guilty
ans2: I feel guilty a good part of the time.
ans3: I feel quite guilty most of the time.
ans4: I feel guilty all of the time.

ans1: I don't feel I am being punished.
ans2: I feel I may be punished.
ans3: I expect to be punished.
ans4: I feel I am being punished.

ans1: I don't feel disappointed in myself.
ans2: I am disappointed in myself.
ans3: I am disgusted with myself.
ans4: I hate myself.

ans1: I don't feel I am any worse than anybody else.
ans2: I am critical of myself for my weaknesses or mistakes.
ans3: I blame myself all the time for my faults.
ans4: I blame myself for everything bad that happens.

ans1: I don't have any thoughts of killing myself.
ans2: I have thoughts of killing myself, but I would not carry them out.
ans3: I would like to kill myself.
ans4: I would kill myself if I had the chance.

ans1: I don't cry any more than usual.
ans2: I cry more now than I used to.
ans3: I cry all the time now.
ans4: I used to be able to cry, but now I can't cry even though I want to

ans1: I am no more irritated by things than I ever was.
ans2: I am slightly more irritated now than usual.
ans3: I am quite annoyed or irritated a good deal of the time.
ans4: I feel irritated all the time.

ans1: I have not lost interest in other people.
ans2: I am less interested in other people than I used to be.
ans3: I have lost most of my interest in other people.
ans4: I have lost all of my interest in other people.

ans1: I make decisions about as well as I ever could.
ans2: I put off making decisions more than I used to.
ans3: I have greater difficulty in making decisions more than I used to.
ans4: I can't make decisions at all anymore.

ans1: I don't feel that I look any worse than I used to.
ans2: I am worried that I am looking old or unattractive.
ans3: I feel there are permanent changes in my appearance that make me look unattractive.
ans4: I believe that I look ugly.

ans1: I can work about as well as before.
ans2: It takes an extra effort to get started at doing something.
ans3: I have to push myself very hard to do anything.
ans4: I can't do any work at all.

ans1: I can sleep as well as usual.
ans2: I don't sleep as well as I used to.
ans3: I wake up 1-2 hours earlier than usual and find it hard to get back to sleep.
ans4: I wake up several hours earlier than I used to and cannot get back to sleep.

ans1: I don't get more tired than usual.
ans2: I get tired more easily than I used to.
ans3: I get tired from doing almost anything.
ans4: I am too tired to do anything.

ans1: My appetite is no worse than usual.
ans2: My appetite is not as good as it used to be.
ans3: My appetite is much worse now.
ans4: I have no appetite at all anymore.

ans1: I haven't lost much weight, if any, lately.
ans2: I have lost more than five pounds.
ans3: I have lost more than ten pounds.
ans4: I have lost more than fifteen pounds.

ans1: I am no more worried about my health than usual.
ans2: I am worried about physical problems like aches, pains, upset stomach, or constipation.
ans3: I am very worried about physical problems and it's hard to think of much else.
ans4: I am so worried about my physical problems that I cannot think of anything else.

ans1: I have not noticed any recent change in my interest in sex.
ans2: I am less interested in sex than I used to be.
ans3: I have almost no interest in sex.
ans4: I have lost interest in sex completely.
